mapper.delete: DELETE a.*, b.*, c.* FROM hf_statement_compare a LEFT JOIN hf_statement_compare_imp b ON a.statement_compare_id = b.statement_compare_id LEFT JOIN hf_statement_compare_result c ON a.statement_compare_id = c.statement_compare_id WHERE a.statement_compare_id = #{statementId};
mapper.select: SELECT b.statement_compare_id statementId, b.hf_month, c.com_account_name, b.imp_record_count, b.diff_count, a.com_account, a.emp_account, a.emp_name, d.imp_amount, d.sys_amount, d.diff_amount, CASE LENGTH(d.employee_id) WHEN 36 THEN '系统不存在' ELSE '' END AS remark FROM hf_statement_compare_imp a INNER JOIN hf_statement_compare b ON a.statement_compare_id = b.statement_compare_id LEFT JOIN hf_com_account c ON b.com_account_id = c.com_account_id LEFT JOIN hf_statement_compare_result d ON b.statement_compare_id = d.statement_compare_id AND a.employee_id = d.employee_id WHERE b.statement_compare_id=#{statementId};

SELECT ea.employee_id, emp.employee_name FROM hf_emp_archive ea INNER JOIN hf_com_account ca ON ca.com_account_id = ea.com_account_id INNER JOIN emp_employee emp ON emp.employee_id = ea.employee_id WHERE ea.is_active = 1 AND emp.employee_name = #{employeeName} AND emp.id_num = #{idNum} AND ea.hf_emp_account = #{empAccount} LIMIT 1

SELECT ea.employee_id, abp.amount sys_amount FROM hf_archive_base_period abp INNER JOIN hf_emp_archive ea ON ea.emp_archive_id = abp.emp_archive_id INNER JOIN hf_com_account ca ON ca.com_account_id = ea.com_account_id INNER JOIN emp_employee emp ON emp.employee_id = ea.employee_id
ea.is_active = 1 AND abp.is_active = 1 AND abp.hf_type = #{hfType} AND ca.com_account_id=#{comAccountId} AND (abp.start_month <= #{hfMonth} AND abp.end_month >= #{hfMonth} OR ( abp.start_month <= #{hfMonth} AND abp.end_month IS NULL))
